title: Finally My new Diana skin!! I LOVE YOU RIOT!
body:
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/04/45-pbe-update.html#more

With over 100k mastery points on Diana, I am so excited she is finally getting a new skin! This looks awesome too! FIRE FOR EVERYONE! Can't wait to see her splash art! I love you RIOT! THANK YOU!

replies.body: Ahhhh, I'm so glad you like her! :D

It is spectacular.

P.S. Thank you again for that ARAM match, 'twas a great way to ring in my 1000th :3
Of course! Glad we were able to win on the first try. :D
I missed my 1000th normal match with a Rito member. I'll snatch one up one of these days. Lol.
too bad its the exact same skin as wildfire zyra
Yep they made it specifically crafted for you. Enjoy.

I'm also excited cause of Taric :D
More than 100k here too!
Awesome! He seems like he will be quite strong now! I hope you like him!

> [{quoted}](name=Blainezy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=k4Ld0lwN,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-04-05T21:11:45.365+0000)
>
> Awesome! He seems like he will be quite strong now! I hope you like him!

I really like everything on him! :D So hyped!
How in the world is she already ready? Wasn't she still in concepting like a week ago?

Everyone is complaining about her for some reason...I admit that when you compare it to what we wanted(everybody wants something different), it doesn't compare. I do feel like they were a little lost on direction when trying to map her out, but when you realistically look at Diana's kit it hard to come up with ideas.  I've tried. I'm happy with it, the sword seems elegant, I like how thin it is compared to the normal skin. As a Diana main I've been waiting for this for ages. Lunar Goddess was amazing and all, but it got old. I give it an 7/10.  I wish the hair looked a bit better. I like it on fire and stuff, but I
m just a fan of long locks.

I think it's really nice and I love all the particle effects, especially with her E. When team fire won I immediately envisioned her being a fireball when she halted and they did that so I'm very happy about that. Lunar goddess and dark Valkyrie are just meh recolors. Which is what I fear they will do to a blood moondiana. But for now, I'm more than happy with this new skin.

To me, a fellow Diana main, it looks like all the effort went into the taric rework and SKT skins rather than this skin... It looks like wildfire Zrya with particles directly from ember spirit in Dota 2 and it's pretty disappointing especially for 1350 rp. Not purchasing this one :/ I'll stick with lunar goddess I guess until a blood moon/lunar wraith one comes out that's worth buying

I think it's quite different. Wildfire Zyra is very lame and isn't very fiery. Infernal Diana had really nice particle effects, especially with her E and she's a FIREBALL when she ults. Lunar Goddess is depressing as a skin. It's just a bright recolor, and while I am excited for if and when a blood
Moon Diana comes out, I fear it will just be a red recolor.

Sure, Boobplate, why not, is not like we have all her skins sexualized.

whatever, im just tired. Fuck riot i guess.
The fact that she turns into a big Fireball when she uses her ult is just the most epic thing! That was what I had in my mind, so I'm glad it was put into the skin!
